sn44.8:1.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn44.8:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.8:1.3: “kim nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko”ti?
sn44.8:1.5: “Kim pana, bho gotama, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn44.8:1.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.8:2.1: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:2.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va?
sn44.8:2.4: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yena bhoto gotamassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:2.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi”ti?
sn44.8:3.1: “Annatitthiya kho, vaccha, paribbajaka rupam attato samanupassanti, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:3.5: vinnanam attato samanupassanti, vinnanavantam va attanam, attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:3.6: Tasma annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:3.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va.
sn44.8:3.9: Tathagato ca kho, vaccha, araham sammasambuddho na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam, na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:3.13: na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam, na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:3.14: Tasma tathagatassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:3.16: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi”ti.
sn44.8:4.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako utthayasana yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahamoggallanena saddhim sammodi.
sn44.8:4.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
sn44.8:4.3: “kim nu kho, bho moggallana, sassato loko”ti?
sn44.8:4.5: “Kim pana, bho moggallana, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn44.8:4.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.8:5.1: “Ko nu kho, bho moggallana, hetu, ko paccayo, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:5.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va?
sn44.8:5.4: Ko pana, bho moggallana, hetu, ko paccayo yena samanassa gotamassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:5.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi”ti?
sn44.8:6.1: “Annatitthiya kho, vaccha, paribbajaka rupam attato samanupassanti, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:6.5: vinnanam attato samanupassanti, vinnanavantam va attanam, attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:6.6: Tasma annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:6.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va.
sn44.8:6.9: Tathagato ca kho, vaccha, araham sammasambuddho na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam, na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:6.13: na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam, na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn44.8:6.14: Tasma tathagatassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.8:6.15: ‘sassato loko’tipi, ‘asassato loko’tipi, ‘antava loko’tipi, ‘anantava loko’tipi, ‘tam jivam tam sariran’tipi, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’tipi, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi”ti.
sn44.8:7.2: Yatra hi nama satthu ca savakassa ca atthena attho byanjanena byanjanam samsandissati, samessati, na virodhayissati, yadidam aggapadasmim.
sn44.8:7.3: Idanaham, bho moggallana, samanam gotamam upasankamitva etamattham apucchim.
sn44.8:7.4: Samanopi me gotamo etehi padehi etehi byanjanehi etamattham byakasi, seyyathapi bhavam moggallano.
sn44.8:7.5: Acchariyam, bho moggallana, abbhutam, bho moggallana.
sn44.8:7.6: Yatra hi nama satthu ca savakassa ca atthena attho byanjanena byanjanam samsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidam aggapadasmin”ti.
